ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 2 of the 3-part "The Stealer." It's a case of the great impersonator being impersonated as Chance heads to Texas to look for an old friend. But it's nothing more than a dangerous wild-goose chase as an impostor with talents to rival Chance's own goes about usurping his life.
Part Two of The Stealer. Christopher Chance is still trying to pick up the pieces of his life. The game of chess between Chance and Tom McFadden heats up as the great impersonator gets impersonated . No one is safe with a crazy Tom McFadden walking around as Chance. Will Chance's friends and family be in the same danger or are they just bait for the final conflict in the last issue to come?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/human-target-20-the-stealer-part-2/4000-99523/
ComicInfo.Title: The Stealer Part Two (of Three)
